<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/81358</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>81358</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>9755</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Food – Interactive Questioning</string>
            <string language="es">Alimentos – Cuestionario interactivo</string>
            <string language="ga">Bia  - Ceistiúchán Idirghníomhach</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Nahrung? Interaktives Ausfragen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Nourriture ? Interrogation Interactive</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Alimento? Questionar Interativo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Alimento? Interrogazione Interattiva</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τρόφιμα; Διαλογική επερώτηση</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The pupil will revise the theme of Food.  Written questions will be used to assess the understanding of the pupil. The pupil will be able to correct themselves. The pupil will use interactive resources to encourage reading.</string>
            <string language="es">El alumno revisará el tema de los alimentos.  Se utilizarán preguntas escritas para evaluar la comprensión del alumno. El alumno podrá corregirse a sí mismo. El alumno utilizará recursos interactivos que le estimulen a leer.</string>
            <string language="ga">Déanfaidh an páiste dul siar ar an téama, Bia.  Beidh úsáid á dhéanamh as ceisteanna scríofa chun tuiscint an pháiste a mheasúnú.  Beidh ar chumas an pháiste féincheartú a dhéanamh. Bainfidh an páiste úsáid as acmhainn idirghníomhach chun an léitheoireacht a chothú. Beidh deis ag an bpáiste léitheoireacht feidhmiúil a dhéanamh.</string>
          </description>
          <language>ga</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Irish</string>
            <string language="es">Irlandés</string>
            <string language="ga">Gaeilge</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Pupille verbessert das Thema der Nahrung. 
Schriftliche Fragen werden verwendet, um das Verständnis der 
Pupille festzusetzen. Die Pupille kann, sich zu beheben. 
Die Pupille benutzt interaktive Betriebsmittel, um Messwert 
anzuregen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La pupille mettra à jour le thème de la 
nourriture. Des questions écrites seront employées pour 
évaluer l'arrangement de la pupille. La pupille pourra se 
corriger. La pupille emploiera les ressources interactives pour 
encourager la lecture.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A pupila revisará o tema do alimento. As 
perguntas escritas serão usadas avaliar a compreensão da pupila. 
A pupila poderá  corrigir-se. A pupila usará recursos 
interativos incentivar a leitura.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La pupilla modificherà il tema di alimento. 
Le domande scritte saranno usate per valutare la comprensione 
della pupilla. La pupilla potrà correggersi. La pupilla 
userà le risorse interattive per consigliare alla lettura.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο μαθητής θα αναθεωρήσει το θέμα των τροφίμων. 
Οι γραπτές ερωτήσεις θα χρησιμοποιηθούν για να αξιολογήσουν 
την κατανόηση του μαθητή. Ο μαθητής θα είναι σε θέση να 
διορθωθεί. Ο μαθητής θα χρησιμοποιήσει τα διαλογικά 
στοιχεία συμπεριφοράς για να ενθαρρύνει την ανάγνωση.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Irisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Irlandais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Irish</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Irlandese</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ιρλανδικά</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
